title: Beau-Rivage Palace, Lausanne to welcome new General Manager
text:
Beau-Rivage Palace, Lausanne to welcome new General Manager Beau-Rivage Palace, Lausanne to welcome new General Manager Details Category: Switzerland Created   15:15 From 1 September 2015, the iconic Beau-Rivage Palace in Lausanne will welcome Nathalie Seiler-Hayez as their new General Manager. Nathalie Seiler-Hayez previously managed The Connaught, one of London’s finest hotels in Mayfair since 2010. After her graduation at Ecole Hôtelière de Lausanne, Nathalie travelled and honed her professional skills in hotel groups such as Rosewood Hotels in New York and in Paris Le Lutetia and the Hôtel du Louvre, gaining a wealth of experience along the way. 
In 2007 she joined the Regent Grand Hôtel de Bordeaux as General Manager, overseeing its opening. “During her career Nathalie Seiler-Hayez has demonstrated a perfect understanding of the values dear to our hotel: Excellence, Pleasure, Hospitality and Tradition in Movement. Her international experience in renowned hotels will without doubt contribute greatly to the Beau-Rivage Palace. Throughout her career she has followed paths in which authenticity, personalisation and history have always played prominent roles.” Related articles
